column1: Little Goat Diner////Ok so I was a little tipsy when I got here (drinks with coworkers beforehand)
column2: and I was starving - so any food would've tasted delicious.  But Little Goat exceeded all ravenous expectations.  I ordered the french toast (breakfast is served all day) which involved a fried egg baked into each piece of sweet onion brioche
column3: accompanied by fried chicken and strawberries. So random
column4: but all the flavors were wild when combined together.  The only downside was the extremely long wait as they don't take reservations.
